text:
The attribute table presented "LDAP Extended Request (ALPHA)"
"Add tests" requires that you hit return on every text field entered
(rather then tabbing/clicking off it) or the modified value is not
saved even though it appears to be. This was problematic as I was
cutting and pasting a number of existing LDIF files into these
windows, and the problem only became apparent when I went to run my
test and found bogus data in virtually all of the fields I'd entered.
creator: nrhope@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text: Works fine for me - I cannot reproduce this.
